text: KHTZ may refer to: * KHTZ (Ganado, Texas), a defunct radio station (94.9 FM) formerly licensed to serve Ganado, Texas, United States * KZHC-FM, a radio station (92.7 FM) licensed to serve Burns, Oregon, United States, which briefly held the call letters KHTZ in 2019 * KAMP-FM, a radio station (97.1 FM) licensed to serve Los Angeles, California, United States, which held the call letters KHTZ from 1978 to 1985
title: KHTZ
